overview: VP, Online Product Marketing for Dassault Systemes, 3DVIA business unit. (www.3dvia.com), David has been a long time tech industry veteran since the original dot-com era. Working on several startups in the VoIP, Video and graphics industry, David has also started several micro-startups including an early event listing site and The Web 2.0 Toolbar. David has also been an active blogger since 2005 and started the popular Boston area tech blog 93south.net in 2006.
